Description.SourceString: Unlocks Pickaxes. Speeds up production time. Increases Health.
Description.LocalizedString: Unlocks Pickaxes. Speeds up production time. Increases Health.

UseDisclaimerText.SourceString: Crafting and smithing gameplay are currently using simplified, temporary mechanics. They will be replaced with completely new systems in future Pre-Alpha builds.
